backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, access control, radio stream checks, requests, and push subscription storage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summaries of all frontend source files and their roles.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DEBUG.md: Notes on a failed frontend TypeScript build caused by Node.js-typed errors in App.tsx.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA meta tags, icons, Google Cast SDK, and a fallback recovery UI for slow React mounts.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining icons, theme color, metadata, and shortcuts for Mawalking Radio.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing caching, cache cleanup, and push notification handling with icon caching.
frontend/README-verify.md: Guide for running the frontend verification script to catch build issues.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend.mjs: Node.js script that checks for browser-incompatible types, runs TypeScript checks, and validates asset paths before deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing global state, navigation, playback, and error boundaries for the app.
frontend/src/components/CastControl.tsx: Chromecast control button enabling users to start or stop casting and track related analytics.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: PWA install prompt and OS/browser-specific installation guides with dismissal logic.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Renders a fixed bottom tab bar for navigating between home, browse, and settings.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: Shows a compact audio player with track info, album art, and a play/pause button.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: Provides a slider to control and sync audio element volume.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: Panel for enabling and managing web push notifications with subscription status and error handling.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: Dialog form allowing users to submit song or shoutâ€‘out requests with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: Banner prompting users to refresh or reset when app updates or service worker errors occur.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Share button using Web Share API with a fallback modal for copying the app link.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Displays a show preview card with image, details, genres, and schedule.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: Renders a red animated badge indicating a live broadcast.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: Shows a pulsing accent-colored on-air indicator dot.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: Displays a styled notification for track events with icons and optional dismissing.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Defines the Show interface and mock show data for display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to authentication and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: Handles resuming audio playback when page visibility, focus, or bfcache state changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: Manages Chromecast availability, initialization, casting state, and session handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Stores and toggles whether the station is marked as a favorite in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity login, loading stored identities, and managing authentication state via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Watches now-playing metadata to detect track, mix, or live changes and triggers browser notifications with deduplication and permission handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Manages push subscription flow including permission requests, service worker integration, backend storage, and unsubscribe handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend and external API calls with React Query for stream URL, now-playing data, stream availability checks, and request submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Handles service worker registration, update detection, reset logic, and readiness state tracking for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Implements a sleep timer that counts down and pauses audio when finished, with start and cancel controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: React hook to request and manage the screen wake lock, handling visibility changes and cleanup.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind and custom theme styles defining dark OKLCH colors, overlays, and responsive background behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: UI for browsing and filtering mock shows by genre and day, displaying results via ShowCard components.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: Live radio home screen with playback controls, station info, and quick actions like favoriting and sharing.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Full-screen now-playing view with album art, track info, playback controls, volume slider, and sleep timer.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Settings and About page with notification settings, station description, and contact links.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: React screen showing detailed show info, with image, metadata, and buttons to download an ICS calendar event or set a reminder.
Captures early startup errors and displays a recovery overlay if critical issues occur.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Utility wrappers for safe Google Analytics event tracking with helpers for audio and cast events.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Generates and downloads an ICS calendar file for a show by computing next occurrence and formatting event fields.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Validates and normalizes artwork URLs, ensuring absolute HTTPS paths and handling relative or malformed inputs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, screens, animations, and theme utilities for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state indicating pending requests to add a user-provided background image and restore the Play button.
